FuncDef: This command configures the encapsulation type on a PW-port. Customer Ethernet frames can be single-tagged or double-tagged, and this command determines the number of tags that the SR OS will check (and strip) on PW-SAP ingress and insert on PW-SAP egress.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the encapsulation type is dot1q; used when the customer's Ethernet frame is single-tagged.
Specifies that the encapsulation type is qinq; used when the customer's Ethernet frame is double-tagged. ParamDefault: Default- dot1q
